title: Best of The Program | Guests: Steven Crowder & Xi Van Fleet | 10/18/21
description:
BlazeTV host Steven Crowder joins to discuss his latest censorship strike from YouTube. Climate change is now being labeled a national security threat. Xi Van Fleet, a Virginia mom who survived Maoist China, joins to share what she sees as similarities to China here in America.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
